title: Systems Design & Automation Engineer
location: Jersey City, NJ / Tampa, FL / Coppell, TX (Hybrid)
description: Design, build, and operate an automation-first platform leveraging RHEL, Ansible Automation Platform, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and AWS for a large professional services firm. Enable self-service for application teams through secure, scalable, and observable platform capabilities.
htmlDescription:
About the Role

Our client, a large professional services firm, is looking to hire a Systems Design & Automation Engineer for a 6-month hybrid contract. The consultant must be commutable from one of three locations and will be spending 2-3 days onsite: Jersey City, NJ; Tampa, FL; or Coppell, TX.

Responsibilities

  • Design, build, and operate an automation-first platform leveraging RHEL, Ansible Automation Platform, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and AWS
  • Enable self-service for application teams through secure, scalable, and observable platform capabilities
  • Automate platform operations using Ansible (Core & Automation Platform)
  • Design and maintain Infrastructure as Code for AWS resources with Terraform
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines for infrastructure and configuration
  • Standardize RHEL lifecycle management (build, harden, patch)
  • Develop and document architecture/design standards and best practices for the Linux environment
  • Create secure patterns for identity, access, and secrets management
  • Build self-service experiences including catalog items and reference architectures

Required Skills

  • 5+ years Linux administration (RHEL expertise)
  • 3+ years AWS at scale; multi-account governance
  • Hands-on experience with Ansible and Terraform
  • Strong scripting skills in Bash/Python
  • CI/CD pipeline experience
  • Knowledge of security/compliance and cloud networking fundamentals
  • Experience with production operations and incident management

Desired Skills

  • Red Hat/AWS certifications
  • Kubernetes/EKS or OpenShift experience
  • Policy-as-Code experience
  • Image pipeline development
  • Cost optimization exposure
